item.title: A Short Virtual Environment Primer
item.description: Virtual envs create a lightweight copy of your current Python binary and a clean, separate site packages folder. To create a virtual environment, use the venv module:

item.title: About
item.description: Ted Kern (“Arnatious”) Roboticist, tools programmer, robotics engineering advocate. Background in classical AI, planning and decision making, embedded systems, and human-robot interaction.
